	<Project>

		<Build>

				<Compiler>
					<Add option="-g" />
				</Compiler>

			<Target title="Release">
				<Option output="bin/Release/ACM2" prefix_auto="1" extension_auto="1" />

				<Option compiler="gcc" />
				<Compiler>

			<envvars />
			<debugger />
			<lib_finder disable_auto="1" />
		</Extensions>

</CodeBlocks_project_file>
